preibisch_imagelib2

Class AbstractInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • preibisch_imagelib2.AbstractEuclideanSpace
      • preibisch_imagelib2.AbstractInterval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dimensions, EuclideanSpace, Interval, RealInterval
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiamondShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, DiamondTipsShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, Extents, FinalInterval, HorizontalLineShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, HyperSphereShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, IntervalIterator, IntervalView, PairOfPointsShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, PeriodicLineShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval, PointSampleList, RandomAccessibleIntervalCursor, RectangleShape.NeighborhoodsIterableInterval

    public abstract class AbstractInterval
extends AbstractEuclideanSpace
implements Interval
    Implementation of the Interval interface.
    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch, Stephan Preibisch
